alert.note: Alert for Southern Campbell (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 01 at 8:08PM MST until January 02 at 11:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 inches north to 9 inches south. The highest snow totals will be along and south of Highway 387. * WHERE...Southern Campbell County. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will create dangerous conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
